languages.text: {n}Техношаман переводит слова Паскаля в резкое стаккато ударов, а затем, солидно кивнув, интересуется:{/n} "Преф вопрошает, зачем ты ищешь его дружбы?"
{n}The tech-shaman translates Pasqal's words into a sharp staccato of drum taps, then nods with an important air and says,{/n} "Pref enquires why you are seeking his friendship."
languages.original_text: {n}Техношаман переводит слова Паскаля в резкое стаккато ударов, а затем, солидно кивнув, интересуется:{/n} "Преф вопрошает, зачем ты ищешь его дружбы?"

languages.text: {n}技術祈祷師はパスカルの言葉を翻訳してドラムを鋭く跳ねるように叩くと、意味ありげにうなずいて口を開く。{/n}「プレフは、なぜ友好を結びたいのかを尋ねている」
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman translates Pasqal's words into a sharp staccato of drum taps, then nods with an important air and says,{/n} "Pref enquires why you are seeking his friendship."

traits.locale_text: {n}技術祈祷師はパスカルの言葉を翻訳してドラムを鋭く跳ねるように叩くと、意味ありげにうなずいて口を開く。{/n}「プレフは、なぜ友好を結びたいのかを尋ねている」
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}技术萨满把帕斯卡的话翻译成断断续续的鼓声，然后郑重地点了点头。{/n}“普雷弗问你为什么要寻求他的友谊。”
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman translates Pasqal's words into a sharp staccato of drum taps, then nods with an important air and says,{/n} "Pref enquires why you are seeking his friendship."

traits.locale_text: {n}技术萨满把帕斯卡的话翻译成断断续续的鼓声，然后郑重地点了点头。{/n}“普雷弗问你为什么要寻求他的友谊。”
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}Le technochaman transmet les paroles de Pasqal à coup de percussions saccadées, puis acquiesce en prenant un air important :{/n} « Pref demande pourquoi vous recherchez son amitié. »
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman translates Pasqal's words into a sharp staccato of drum taps, then nods with an important air and says,{/n} "Pref enquires why you are seeking his friendship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le technochaman transmet les paroles de Pasqal à coup de percussions saccadées, puis acquiesce en prenant un air important :{/n} « Pref demande pourquoi vous recherchez son amitié. »
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}El tecnochamán traduce las palabras de Pasqal golpeando su tambor con un firme staccato, luego asiente con un aire de superioridad y dice:{/n} «Pref pregunta por qué busca su amistad».
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman translates Pasqal's words into a sharp staccato of drum taps, then nods with an important air and says,{/n} "Pref enquires why you are seeking his friendship."

traits.locale_text: {n}El tecnochamán traduce las palabras de Pasqal golpeando su tambor con un firme staccato, luego asiente con un aire de superioridad y dice:{/n} «Pref pregunta por qué busca su amistad».
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}Der Tech-Schamane übersetzt Pasqals Worte in ein scharfes Staccato von Trommelschlägen, nickt dann selbstgefällig und sagt:{/n} "Präf fragt, warum Ihr seine Freundschaft begehrt."
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman translates Pasqal's words into a sharp staccato of drum taps, then nods with an important air and says,{/n} "Pref enquires why you are seeking his friendship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Tech-Schamane übersetzt Pasqals Worte in ein scharfes Staccato von Trommelschlägen, nickt dann selbstgefällig und sagt:{/n} "Präf fragt, warum Ihr seine Freundschaft begehrt."
traits.speaker: TechShaman

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın sözlerini keskin ve kesik davul vuruşlarıyla tercüme eden tekno şaman, sonrasında azametli bir edayla başını eğerek konuşuyor.{/n} "Pref, neden dostluğunu gözettiğinizi sorguluyor."
languages.original_text: {n}The tech-shaman translates Pasqal's words into a sharp staccato of drum taps, then nods with an important air and says,{/n} "Pref enquires why you are seeking his friendship."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tekno şaman, Pasqal'ın sözlerini keskin ve kesik davul vuruşlarıyla tercüme ediyor, ardından azametli bir edayla başını eğerek konuşuyor:{/n} "Pref, neden onun dostluğunu istediğinizi sorguluyor."
traits.speaker: TechShaman
